description:
Go from land to sea, then back again. These quick drying shorts are built to stand up to the rigors of water, sun and sand.

  • Recycled polyester blend has FlashDry™ technology to speed up drying times
  • 1 colourway has a hidden print that appears when they get wet, the Pink Glo TNF Tagline Phantom Print shows another side once wet. With the Summit Navy Mountain Panorama Print, what you see is what you get
  • Elasticized waistband and an internal drawcord for a customized fit
  • Front patch pockets are perfect for holding beach treasures
  • Inseam is 2.5 in. (all sizes)
name: The North Face Amphibious Class V Shorts - Girls' - Children to Youths
